page.title: 13CLUBS AND EVENTS
page.content: On the sporting front, the area has a flourishing association football team, Slimbridge A.F.C., with its own ground just outside the village. The Village Hall at Slimbridge serves most of the area and is "home" for the Women's Institute, Mother' Union and Mother and Toddler Group amongst others. Surprisingly there was no evidence of any organised activities for the children of the area such as brownies, guides, cubs, scouts and youth club. There is, however, a Bible Reading class every week to which youngsters are welcome. The three annual events which attract the most interest are the Slimbridge Horse Show with its horse jumping and associated sideshows; the Slimbridge Church Flower Festival for which the Church is specially
